description: Fix response parsing so that leading and trailing spaces are preserved

The ``aws configure`` and ``aws configure set`` command now write out all credential variables to the shared credentials file ``~/.aws/credentials`` (`issue 847 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/847>`__)
Write warnings and errors to standard error as opposed to standard output. (`issue 919 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/919>`__)
Add ``--only-show-errors`` option that displays errors and warnings but suppresses all other output.
Added ability to upload local file streams from standard input to s3 and download s3 objects as local file streams to standard output. (`issue 903 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/903>`__)
